properties.name: lotecs.auth.grpc.address
properties.description: Address of the Auth gRPC server. Format: static://host:port or dns:///host:port

properties.name: lotecs.auth.grpc.deadline-ms
properties.description: Deadline in milliseconds for gRPC calls.

properties.name: lotecs.auth.grpc.negotiation-type
properties.description: Negotiation type for gRPC connection. Options: PLAINTEXT, TLS

properties.name: lotecs.auth.grpc.enable-retry
properties.description: Enable automatic retry for failed gRPC calls.

properties.name: lotecs.auth.grpc.max-retry-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts when retry is enabled.
